title: frontend and backend applications that
extract: Backend. The backend usually consists of three parts: a server, an application, and a database. If you book a flight or buy concert tickets, you usually open a website and interact with the frontend. Once you've entered that information, the application stores it in a database that was created on a server.
extract_html: Backend. The backend usually consists of three parts: a server, an application, and a database. If you book a flight or buy concert tickets, you usually open a website and interact with the frontend. Once you've entered that information, the application stores it in a database that was created on a server.
